ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Consensus funding posture aligning excellence, equity, and strategic alignment.

bullets.item: Bias-aware peer review with early-career set-asides.
Core facilities support tied to utilization metrics.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Structured review with bias mitigations and diversity targets.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Fiscal guardrails and review cadence per semester.
